content.json:
Changes in Roles

Identifies changes in sensitive roles.

Sensitive Privileged Users - Actions & Changes

Identifies activity of sensitive privileged users or other suspicious activity.

content.title: Events of Sensitive Privileged Users

content.query:
let PrivUsers = SAPUsersGetPrivileged | summarize by User;
SAPAuditLog
| where TimeGenerated {TimeSelect}
| where (SystemID in ({Systems}) or  '*' in ({Systems}))
| where User in (PrivUsers)
| summarize Events = count() by Time = bin(TimeGenerated,1h), User
| make-series Events=avg(Events) on Time from ago(30d) to ago(0d) step 1h by User
| extend (Anomalies, Score, Baseline) = series_decompose_anomalies(Events, 1.5, -1, 'linefit')
| project-away Score
content.title: Anomalies of Sensitive Privileged Users
Count of Users Changed by Sensitive Priviledged Users (Press to Investigate)
Sensitive Priviledged Users were Changed (Press to Investigate)
Users Changed by {UserChange2}
Users made a Change in Sensitive Priviledged User: {ChangedUser}

content.query:
// Define variables
let MinutesThreshold = 15; // Difference by minutes between Unlock and Connect
let AuditUserUnlocked = dynamic(['AUA']); // Message of unlock user
let AuditLogIn = dynamic(['AU1', 'AU5']); // Messages of connect with user
// Query Logic
let UserUnlocked = // Get users unlocked
SAPAuditLog
| where MessageID in (AuditUserUnlocked)
| project-rename UserUnlockTimeGenerated = TimeGenerated, UserUnlocked = Variable1;
SAPAuditLog // Get users connections
| where TimeGenerated {TimeSelect}
| where (SystemID in ({Systems}) or  '*' in ({Systems}))
| where MessageID in (AuditLogIn)
| lookup kind=inner UserUnlocked on TerminalIPv6, $left.User == $right.UserUnlocked // Lookup of user unlocked to user log in
| where abs(datetime_diff('Minute', TimeGenerated, UserUnlockTimeGenerated)) <= MinutesThreshold // Connect after unlock
| summarize by TimeGenerated, SystemID, ClientID, UserAction = User1, UserUnlocked = User, AccountCustomEntity = Email, IPCustomEntity = TerminalIPv6, HostCustomEntity = Host
content.title: Unlocking a User and Logging into to it From the Same IP
Sensitive User Password was Changed and then Login into to the System (Press to Investigate)

content.query:
SAPAuditLog
| where TimeGenerated {TimeSelect}
| where (SystemID in ({Systems}) or  '*' in ({Systems}))
| where User == "{User}"
| order by TimeGenerated desc
| project TimeGenerated, SystemID, ClientID, MessageID ,MessageClass, MessageText
| take 20
content.title: Detailed Activity of Suspicious User: {User}

content.json:
Sensitive Assignments

Identifies new assignments for a sensitive role or profile to a user.

content.title: Sensitive Profile Assignments (Press to Investigate)
Sensitive Profiles Distribution

content.query:
SAPAuditLog 
| where TimeGenerated {TimeSelect}
| where (SystemID in ({Systems}) or  '*' in ({Systems}))
| where User=='{User_p}'
| order by TimeGenerated desc
| project TimeGenerated, SystemID, ClientID, MessageID ,MessageClass, MessageText
| take 20
content.title: Detailed Activity of Suspicious User: {User_p}
